Posts.Content: Apr 14, 2012 06:38PM catherinejane wrote: For those of you who have been following this post and supporting Donese and Robin, it is with great sadness that I tell you that Robin passed away yesterday.  Please keep Donese and Robin's family in your prayers. Cathy
Posts.Title: Halaven - Day 1 PJB Wanderingneedle

Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2010 12:35PM catherinejane wrote: chrishat - your thoughts are almost exactly how I feel.  It really is a mental challenge to not let the cough or fatigue send me into the "what if" thinking.  I especially identified with the thoughts on people's reactions to being done with treatment.  Just like me, they expected that I'd have continual tests and scans to "know" but that isn't how my doctor does follow up.  I just thank them and agree.  My typical answer is "no news is good news".  I think going into this I really anticipated how hard this part of the journey would be.  In many ways, I feel as if my real breast cancer journey begain AFTER I finished treatment and not during.
